/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sun shines brightly in the clear blue sky, casting a warm glow over the scene. Buildings and trees line the sides of the road, adding depth and context to the image. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the busy nature of the area. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting against the blue of the sky.
